profile

Class BasicProfileController<T extends BasicProfileView>

  • java.lang.Object
    • profile.BasicProfileController<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - generic used to allow child classes to use methods from T's child classes
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    PictureObserver
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    FriendProfileController, OwnProfileController, StrangerProfileController

    public class BasicProfileController<T extends BasicProfileView>
extends java.lang.Object
implements PictureObserver
    BasicProfileController acts as Controller for Facebook MVC Pairs with BasicProfileView to display only name, picture, search bar, settings, and logout Meant to be extended for further functionality
    Author:
    Tim
